prediction.title: Prediction feature
prediction.description: This enables or disables prediction / autocomplete suggestions from showing when typing in the Equation editor.

equation.title: Equation Drawer
equation.description: Show/hide the Equation input button on the toolbar. This will stop the Equation editor drawer from being accessed.

latex.title: LaTeX Drawer
latex.description: Show/hide the LaTeX input button on the toolbar. This will stop the LaTeX drawer from being accessed.

graph.title: Graph Drawer
graph.description: Show/hide the graph input button on the toolbar. This will stop the graph drawer from being accessed.

handwriting.title: Handwriting Drawer
handwriting.description: Show/hide the handwriting input button on the toolbar. This will stop the handwriting drawer from being accessed.

speech.title: Speech Drawer
speech.description: Show/hide the speech input button on the toolbar. This will stop the speech input drawer from being accessed.

companion.title: Mobile Drawer
companion.description: Show/hide the Equatio mobile button on the toolbar. This will stop the mobile drawer from being accessed.

equatio-mathspace.title: Mathspace Inserts
equatio-mathspace.description: Show/hide the insert mathspace button on the toolbar.

screenshot_reader.title: Screenshot Reader Feature
screenshot_reader.description: Show/hide the screenshot reader button on the toolbar.

equatio-academy.title: Equatio Academy Tips
equatio-academy.description: Show/hide tips displayed at the bottom of a drawer. These tips can be opened in floating window with more details.

stem-tools.title: STEM Tools
stem-tools.description: Remove STEM Tools button from the toolbar. STEM Features such as the molecular viewer, periodic table and calculator.

ai-generation.title: AI Generation
ai-generation.description: This enables or disables our math AI generation tools.
